hedline.hl1: Homing In on a City Before You Go

abstract.p: International Assn of Convention and Visitors Bureaus sponsors new Web site providing links to official Web sites of visitors bureaus and tourist boards in more than 1,000 cities in 27 countries (S)

block.p: A new Web site sponsored by the International Association of Convention and Visitor Bureaus provides links to the official Web sites of visitors bureaus and tourist boards of more than 1,000 cities in 27 countries.
The site, www.officialtravelinfo.com, which went on line in May, can be searched by city or by country. Cities in the United States are subdivided by state.

A new Web site sponsored by the International Association of Convention and Visitor Bureaus provides links to the official Web sites of visitors bureaus and tourist boards of more than 1,000 cities in 27 countries.
The site, www.officialtravelinfo.com, which went on line in May, can be searched by city or by country. Cities in the United States are subdivided by state.

For each destination, links are provided to organizations providing tourism information and promotion, and to the Web sites of airports and news organizations. A connection to World Time Server provides the local time, and a separate link to the Weather Channel offers weather forecasts.
